thread.title: Tony-winning Irish playwright Brian Friel dies at 86
thread.title_full: Tony-winning Irish playwright Brian Friel dies at 86

title: Tony-winning Irish playwright Brian Friel dies at 86
text: > Entertainment Tony-winning Irish playwright Brian Friel dies at 86 FILE - This is a Sept. 11, 2009 file photo of playwright Brian Friel sitting in a theatre in Dublin. Authorities say Brian Friel, the Tony Award-winning playwright who created ``Dancing at Lughnasa’’ and more than 30 other plays, has died at the age of 86. The Arts Council of Ireland says in a statement that Friel died Friday Oct. 2, 2015. The cause of death was not given. (Niall Carson/PA , File via AP)
